attributes.action: Make St Sexburga England's new Patron Saint
attributes.additional_details:
There is a lot of chatter about why St George's day isn't a Bank Holiday? Well the flags might be out but the sun isn't.

SOLUTION: Ditch St George's day - he was born in Israel anyway - and adopt St Sexburga as our new patron saint, SHE'S ENGLISH! Making 6th July a Bank Holiday

Never mind no meat on a Friday, you're guaranteed a SEXBURGA once a year and a lie in.
